name: Time ATK
description:
A simple game about getting to the exit of the level before time runs out. There is also a coin hidden in each level.

Controls:

A and D: Move Left And Right
Space: Jump

Notes:

This game was made in 3-4 days for the Nokia Jam 4 Game jam. The game is upscaled so it can be played without having too much trouble seeing but the base resolution is 84 x 48
